H0.text: who wrote the song going to kansas city. Little Willie Littlefield

H1.text: who wrote the song going to kansas city. Mike Stoller

H2.text: who wrote the song going to kansas city. Chuck Berry

H3.text: who wrote the song going to kansas city. Jerry Leiber

A4.text: Leiber and Stoller found success as the writers of such crossover hit songs as 'Hound Dog' (1952) and 'Kansas City' (1952)

A5.text: His first session for Federal produced 'K. C. Loving', written by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller and later re-recorded by Wilbert Harrison as 'Kansas City'
